name: Selection Sharer
tagline: Medium like popover menu to share on Twitter or by email any text selected on the page
body:
# selection-sharer Medium like popover menu to share on Twitter or by email any text selected on the page. ![](http://f.cl.ly/items/1i0v3l2b3P342D2b302J/share-selection.png) ## Bookmarklet version Add a new bookmark to your bookmark bar, edit its url and copy paste the following code: javascript:(function(){var s=document.createElement('script');s.src="https://raw.github.com/xdamman/share-selection/master/dist/bookmarklet.js";document.body.appendChild(s);})() ## How to use on your site This script requires jQuery so make sure you have it loaded on your page. Add the stylesheet in the `` of your page: and add the Javascript at the bottom of your page near the closing `` tag: Or if you are using [requirejs](http://requirejs.org), you can simply do: require(["dist/selection-sharer"], function(SelectionSharer) { var sharer = new SelectionSharer(); selectionSharer.setElements('p'); // bind mouseup event to all

elements }); That's it. ### Notes - Images are included inline in the CSS as SVG (perfect for Retina displays and loading time) - Total size gzipped minified: 3.5K (equally split between css and javascript) ## Build To recompile the minified versions of the css and javascript in the `dist/` directory, simply run: npm install ## Contribute This is still early days so there is still a lot to do and I welcome contributions. TODO: - Make a browser extension - Make a Wordpress plugin - Add support for different themes - Add tests - Tests across multiple browsers (currently only tested on Chrome, Safari, Firefox on a Mac) - Remove dependency on jQuery - Make the CSS more robust against collisions
